# Rick Sanchez Algorithm (super ez)

### Description

In and out morty a 20 second adventure

```
C = 
n = 
e = 
```

### Solution

its a simple rsa

just copy `c, n, e` and paste them in [dcodefr rsa](dcode.fr/rsa-cipher) and you will get the flag

or you could go fancy, get p and q from [dcodefr rsa](dcode.fr/rsa-cipher) and do it manually.

```python
C = 
n = 
e = 
p = 
q = 

phi = (p-1)*(q-1)
d = pow(e, -1, phi)

decode = pow(C, d, n)
print(decode.to_bytes((decode.bit_length() + 7) // 8, 'big'))

```

flag ---> shctf{1_w4n7_thA7_mCnu99E7_5auc3_M0R7Y}
